Description: 2017 Les Paul Classic HP dressed in a gorgeous Heritage Cherryburst Finish in like new condition! Titanium bridge saddles, Titanium nut, removable pickguard, optional wiring system for an additional 150 sonic combinations and aluminum case all included. Comes with all COA and original chrome pickup rings and chrome volume knobs. It has been professionally setup, feels and plays amazing!Top Features:LP`s Classic class concentrates on a vintage/modern combination of standard Les Paul features. The accent is on vintage looks/modern tone disparity. 2017 lineup features two Classic models, one in "T" lineup and (this) one in "HP" section. Les Paul Classic 2017 One-piece mahogany neck rocks the comfy slim taper profile and fast access heel in the back, with a bound rosewood fingerboard perched on top (1.745" nut instead of the classic 1-11/16"). Major hardware and electronics appointments featured on this Classic LP include Super '57 Buckers (four push/pull pots and DIP switch), two-piece bridge unit (aluminum bridge w/titanium saddles) and robotic G Force tuners.
Title: Gibson Les Paul Classic HP 2017
